actions.Name: Fire in Red
actions.Description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 400.

Additional Effect:

Grants Aetherhues

Duration:

30s

This action is affected by Hyperphantasia.

actions.Name: Tempera Coat
actions.Description:
Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage totaling 20% of maximum HP.

Duration:

10s

Reduces the recast time of Tempera Coat by 60 seconds when barrier is completely absorbed.

actions.Name: Smudge
actions.Description:
Quickly dash 15 yalms forward.

Additional Effect:

Increases movement speed

Duration:

5s

Cannot be executed while bound.

actions.Name: Fire II in Red
actions.Description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 80 to target and all enemies nearby it.

Additional Effect:

Grants Aetherhues

Duration:

30s

This action is affected by Hyperphantasia.

actions.Name: Creature Motif
actions.Description:
Paints a creature motif.

This action changes when placed on the hotbar in the order of

Pom Motif

,

Wing Motif

,

Claw Motif

, and

Maw Motif

when executed in succession.

Cast immediately when used outside of combat.

actions.Name: Living Muse
actions.Description:
Renders your depiction of a creature to life.

Maximum Charges:

3

Can only be executed when a

Creature Motif

is depicted on the Creature Canvas.

actions.Name: Mog of the Ages
actions.Description:
Render your moogle portrait to life, dealing unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 1,100 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.

Can only be executed while Moogle Portrait is active.

actions.Name: Weapon Motif
actions.Description:
Paints a weapon motif.

This action changes to

Hammer Motif

when placed on the hotbar.

Cast immediately when used outside of combat.

actions.Name: Steel Muse
actions.Description:
Render your depiction of a weapon to life.

Maximum Charges:

2

Can only be executed in combat and when a Weapon Motif is depicted on the Weapon Canvas.

actions.Name: Hammer Stamp
actions.Description:
Deals unaspected damage as a critical direct hit with a potency of 520 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.

Can only be executed while under the effect of Hammer Time.

actions.Name: Subtractive Palette
actions.Description:
Grants 3 stacks of Subtractive Palette.

Additional Effect:

Grants Monochrome Tones

Monochrome Tones Effect:

Converts one stack of White Paint into Black Paint

Palette Gauge Cost:

50

actions.Name: Blizzard in Cyan
actions.Description:
Deals ice damage with a potency of 700.

Additional Effect:

Grants Aetherhues

Duration:

30s

Can only be executed while under the effect of

Subtractive Palette

.

This action is affected by Hyperphantasia.

actions.Name: Blizzard II in Cyan
actions.Description:
Deals ice damage with a potency of 160 to target and all enemies nearby it.

Additional Effect:

Grants Aetherhues

Duration:

30s

Can only be executed while under the effect of

Subtractive Palette

.

This action is affected by Hyperphantasia.

actions.Name: Landscape Motif
actions.Description:
Paints a landscape motif.

This action changes to

Starry Sky Motif

when placed on the hotbar.

Cast immediately when used outside of combat.

actions.Name: Scenic Muse
actions.Description:
Render your depiction of a landscape to life.

Can only be executed in combat and when a Landscape Motif is depicted on the Landscape Canvas.

actions.Name: Holy in White
actions.Description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 480 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.

Can only be executed while under the effect of White Paint.

This action is affected by Hyperphantasia.

actions.Name: Tempera Grassa
actions.Description:
Creates a barrier around self and all nearby party members that absorbs damage totaling 10% of maximum HP.

Duration:

10s

Reduces the recast time of

Tempera Coat

by 30 seconds when barrier is completely absorbed.

Can only be executed when under the effect of Tempera Coat.

actions.Name: Comet in Black
actions.Description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 780 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.

Can only be executed while under the effect of Black Paint and Monochrome Tones.

This action is affected by Hyperphantasia.

actions.Name: Rainbow Drip
actions.Description:
Deals unaspected damage to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 900 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.

Additional Effect:

Grants White Paint

When Rainbow Bright is active, Rainbow Drip can be cast immediately and its recast timer is reduced.

actions.Name: Star Prism
actions.Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 1,300 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.

Additional Effect:

Restores HP of all party members nearby target

Cure Potency:

400

Can only be executed while under the effect of Starstruck.

This action is affected by Hyperphantasia.

roleActions.Description: Spells can be cast without interruption. Additional Effect: Nullifies most knockback and draw-in effects Duration: 6s
roleActions.Description_de:
Dein nächster Zauber wird nicht unterbrochen.

Zusatzeffekt: Fast alle Rückstoß- und Heranzieheffekte unwirksam

Dauer: 6 Sekunden
roleActions.Description_fr: Vous permet de lancer vos sorts sans risque d'interruption. Annule la plupart des projections et attractions. Durée: 6s
roleActions.Description_ja: 一定時間、魔法詠唱を詠唱妨害されずに行うことができる。 さらに、一部を除くすべてのノックバックと引き寄せを無効化する。　効果時間：6秒
roleActions.Name: Surecast

roleActions.Description: Lowers target's physical damage dealt by 5% and magic damage dealt by 10%. Duration: 10s
roleActions.Description_de:
Du verringerst den ausgeteilten physischen Schaden um 5% und den ausgeteilten magischen Schaden um 10%.

Dauer: 10 Sekunden
roleActions.Description_fr: Réduit respectivement de 5% et 10% les dégâts physiques et magiques infligés par la cible. Durée: 10s
roleActions.Description_ja: 一定時間、対象の与物理ダメージを5％、与魔法ダメージを10％減少させる。　効果時間：10秒
roleActions.Name: Addle

roleActions.Description: Next spell is cast immediately. Duration: 10s
roleActions.Description_de:
Du kannst deinen nächsten Zauber sofort wirken.

Dauer: 10 Sekunden
roleActions.Description_fr: Permet à votre prochain sort d'être instantané. Durée: 10s
roleActions.Description_ja: 一定時間、次の1回の魔法詠唱について、詠唱時間無しで詠唱することができる。　効果時間：10秒
roleActions.Name: Swiftcast

roleActions.Description: Gradually restores own MP. Potency: 55 Duration: 21s
roleActions.Description_de:
Du regenerierst schrittweise eigene MP.

Regenerationswirkung: 55

Dauer: 21 Sekunden
roleActions.Description_fr: Restaure périodiquement vos PM. Puissance: 55 Durée: 21s
roleActions.Description_ja: 自身のＭＰを継続回復する。 効果量：55　効果時間：21秒
roleActions.Name: Lucid Dreaming

roleActions.Description: Puts target and all nearby enemies to sleep. Duration: 30s Cancels auto-attack upon execution.
roleActions.Description_de: Du versetzt das Ziel und die Gegner in seiner Nähe in Schlaf. Dauer: 30 Sekunden Unterbindet Auto-Attacke.
roleActions.Description_fr: Inflige Sommeil à la cible et aux ennemis autour. Durée: 30s Interrompt vos attaques automatiques.
roleActions.Description_ja: 対象とその周囲の敵に睡眠を付与する。　効果時間：30秒 実行後にオートアタックを停止する。
roleActions.Name: Sleep
